title: How can I get a Google Pixel 5 for free. I have spent all my money on a new iPhone 12 and regretting
content:
I really want to test out a Google Pixel. It have been a long time I used an Android device and I really want to try the best Android. Sadly I am stuck in the Apple ecosystem and bought the new iPhone 12 and I want to try out the Pixel 5. 

Also I wanna show my friends what Android is really about. iPhone have become a luxury and as a dev I think it is really bad idea. 

Please someone get me a Pixel 5. Itâ€™s just too much overpriced in India. 699$-99,000â‚¹ what the hell is wrong...

Please Google show some mercy on me and get me a Pixel 5 for this Christmas ðŸŽ„
